pkgmetadata.longdescription:
<<https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LumiGuide/haskell-opencv/master/data/haskell-opencv-logo-200x82.png>>
This is a Haskell library providing a binding to OpenCV-3.x. It binds directly with the C++ API using the @inline-c@ Haskell library.
The library is far from complete but the framework is there to easily bind missing functionality.
Note that the OpenCV contrib modules are provided by <http://hackage.haskell.org/package/opencv-extra opencv-extra>.
Make sure to checkout the <https://github.com/LumiGuide/haskell-opencv/tree/master/opencv-examples opencv-examples>.
